scripts.start: nodemon --ignore var/ --exec yarn ts-node index.ts -e ts,js,json,graphql
scripts.initdbdock: docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS Packrat'" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < /app/scripts/Packrat.SCHEMA.sql" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < /app/scripts/Packrat.PROC.sql" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < /app/scripts/Packrat.DATA.sql"
scripts.dropdbdock: docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Packrat'"
scripts.initdb: sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS Packrat'" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.SCHEMA.sql" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.PROC.sql" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.DATA.sql"
scripts.dropdb: sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Packrat'"
